definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: For many years, Packard outsold Cadillac by a wide margin.
sentences.chinese: 許多年來，柏加的銷量遠遠領先於凱迪拉克。

sentences.english: General Motors is scaling back plans to produce Cadillacs in China.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽車公司正在計劃調低凱迪拉克在中國的產量。

sentences.english: Shield Cadillac symbolizes the heroic army.
sentences.chinese: 盾象徵着凱迪拉克軍隊的英勇善戰。

sentences.english: By 1950, Cadillac was way ahead of Packard.
sentences.chinese: 1950年，凱迪拉克的銷量遠遠領先於柏加。

sentences.english: Excerpted from "Land of the Lost Souls" by Cadillac Man.
sentences.chinese: 節選自《幽魂之地》，作者凱迪拉克超人。

sentences.english: I have a Cadillac Escalade and I am not willing to destroy it within the first two months.
sentences.chinese: 我有一輛凱迪拉克，我不願意摧毀它的頭兩個月。

sentences.english: Drawing a Cadillac Escalade requires attention to small details.
sentences.chinese: 繪製凱迪拉克需要注意的小細節。

sentences.english: You can hardly miss them in their new-age pink Cadillacs.
sentences.chinese: 您可以幾乎錯過他們的新時代的粉紅色凱迪拉克。

sentences.english: Driving new Cadillacs , paying 50 per cent on a bet.
sentences.chinese: 開着新凱迪拉克我先幫他們付一半的錢。

sentences.english: Cadillac is a luxury vehicle marque owned by General Motors.
sentences.chinese: 凱迪拉克是通用汽車旗下的豪華汽車品牌。

sentences.english: Cadillac trademark is the founder of the city of Detroit and honor the heroic ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 凱迪拉克商標是底特律城創始人的祖先的英勇和榮譽。

definition: Taiwan equivalent of 奔馳|奔驰[Ben1 chi2]
range of values/category defined by a range of values (tier, bracket, stratum etc)
